title: FS: Frank Smith (white cap) PSA 8OC Old Mill **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: Frank Smith (white cap) PSA 8OC Old Mill **SOLD**
posts.post_content: One of the toughest commons to find in high grade, and a very scarce back as well. There are only 5 Old Mills in the entire Pop report with this being the highest by far.... This card is actually pretty well centered except for a slight diamond cut. Back is 50/50 centered and flawless.....$795 delivered...**SOLD**
